Name: Dig
Effect: Reveal the top card of the Server Deck and resolve its abilities.

Name: Filter
Effect: You may discard 1 card. If you do, draw a card

Name: Heart of Gold
Effect: You may heal a player for 1, you may only activate this if you have gained Crypto this turn.

Name: Redistribute
Effect: You may discard a card to give all other players 1 Crypto

Name: Slinger
Effect: If you have dug, healed a player, and gained a crypto, do each one more time.
